content: \ this pattern is free on my website \ \ 1\ it will be run as a daily cal from december 16th-19th with one section being released daily join \ the juniper & oakes fb group\ \ 2\ to share your photos \ this cal is also being offered in my ravelry group\ \ 3\ a new thing for me so be patient there is also a video tutorial yarn \ vanna s choice\ \ 4\ \ wander acrylic\ \ 5\ \ hook 5mm/h furls oddysey\ \ 6\ \ 1\ https //www juniperandoakes com/blog/cozy-alpine-christmas-stocking-freecrochetpattern \ 2\ https //www facebook com/groups/juniperandoakes/ \ 3\ https //ravelry com/events/cozy-alpine-crochet-along \ 4\ https //shrsl com/3rksj \ 5\ http //shrsl com/3ss5z \ 6\ http //shrsl com/3ss61
